sidebar.title: Part 1: HPE End User License Agreement
sidebar.para: The end user license agreement is provided at the time of purchase.

sidebar.title: Part 2: Additional License Authorizations (ALA)
sidebar.para: Additional license authorizations for [[[kw-hos]]] are available at: http://docs.hpcloud.com/pdf/static/HPE_HOS_5.0_ALA_May2017.pdf.

sidebar.title: Part 3: Open Source and Third Party License Terms
sidebar.para: License information related to ancillary, third party, and open source software components are available at: http://docs.hpcloud.com/pdf/static/HPE_HOS_5.0_OpenSource_and_3rd_Party_Licenses.pdf.
